languages.text: At the beginning of every combat, the psyker's allies gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. The first critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} removes this effect.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого боя союзники псайкера получают +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. Первое критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} снимает этот эффект.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of every combat, the Psyker's allies gain +25% critical hit chance. The first critical hit removes this effect.

languages.text: 每次战斗开始时，灵能者的所有盟友都会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}。此效果会在首次暴击之后移除。

languages.text: Al comienzo de cada combate, los aliados del psíquico ganan +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. El primer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico infligido elimina este efecto.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de cada combate, los aliados del psíquico ganan +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. El primer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico infligido elimina este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時に、異能者の仲間は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}に+15%追加される。その戦闘で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}が発生したときにこの効果はなくなる。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of every combat, the psyker's allies gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. The first critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} removes this effect.

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes Kampfes erlangen die Verbündeten des Psionikers +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}. Der erste kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} entfernt diesen Effekt.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jedes Kampfes erlangen die Verbündeten des Psionikers +25 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}. Der erste kritische {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} entfernt diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text: Au début de chaque combat, les alliés du psyker bénéficient de +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}. Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique met fin à cet effet.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of every combat, the psyker's allies gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. The first critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chaque combat, les alliés du psyker bénéficient de +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique. Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique met fin à cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin dost birimleri, her çatışmanın başlangıcında +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Yapılan ilk kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g}, bu etkiyi kaldırır.
